regular-body:
becomeimp:

”A lot of people have played Undertale. A lot. More than have read Homestuck. So not a lot of people know who this guy is, other than “He’s a dog, maybe??”. So here’s a complete-as-I-can-tell list of what he’s done other than the weird video game about….dogs, maybe??

List of Homestuck Music: Ctr-F and putting “Radiation” gets 30 hits. Incredibly, this page is only music IN THE COMIC and PRE GIGAPAUSE. He has written MUCH more music than this, pretty much uncountable. Look in almost any Homestuck album and you’ll find at least 1 song by Toby.

The Baby Is You: A fully-voiced Homestuck musical about Karket getting Dave pregnant, and the baby is John! This was made to spite the MSPA Forum, as people where getting banned for shipping Dave/Rose after the reveal they were siblings. Talking about this album on the forum is strictly forbidden, and because of this Toby has a “ban” on the forum (his account shows up as banned, but otherwise can post and function normally).

Tavros.MP3: The closest thing to a sequel to The Baby Is You. Latula is a southpark spoof, Tavros is an angry grandpa with no friends, and Karkat loves FIFA 2008.

Homosuck Anthem: Another unreleased Homestuck track he did. This one is of special note because the Fly Buzzing noise is reused when you first meet Sans in Undertale, and the yoda-sounding “hmmMmMmM” is a sample from Karkat from The Baby Is You.

tobyfox.net/msuics/: This is where he keeps all his bizarre stuff. There’s snippets of music, remixes of nes/snes songs, the smash bros announcer lines??

Happy Birthday Toby: Made by a friend of his. It’s a fully working Undertale fight against the Ice Cube Dog from the crossword game

A Very Hussie Christmas: An extremely weird song he wrote for Hussie for christmas. The phrase “Greetings Andrew Hussie this is Radiation” originates from here and was used again in “The Baby is You”. Features demon bro, “Andrew Hussie likes Queer dick”, and rhyming “Hussie” with “Horse Pussie”. Samples the Sweet Bro and Hella Jeff theme, an there’s a…dog, maybe???

Sound Test: Two pages of unrelease music. I recommend “The Ballad of Jack Noir”, “Dave vs. Bro”, and “Sweet Bro Hella Jeff the Musical”, all of which feature Toby singing.

Fangamer Undertale Presentation:  Toby showed off Undertale at an Earthbound convention. He turns into a dog. Comedy ensues.

“Radiation” by Michael G. Bowman [LINK MISSING]: Bowman dressed up as the hip “Radiation” and showed off his pad and piles of cash he got for creating Homestuck. Video has been taken down and Bowman has promised never to dress up as him again.

Earthbound Halloween Hack: this is what made him famous enough to get in the business. A hack of Earthbound with a complete story and a complete soundtrack. Birthplace of Megalovania (see: [S] WAKE, and Undertale)

Old Site: A website of his not updated for 8 years. Only the “About” page has information, but it’s pretty good information.

Bandcamp: Listen to (and purchase) most of the Undertale songs, including the Demo’s soundtrack (which, if you didn’t know, is its own complete game)

————————————-

A few Undertale goodies because why not:

Sans/Papyrus were inspired by Wiedle’s comic Helvetica and they make direct references to this old “blurb” by Andrew Hussie

So Sorry is a secret boss, and was created by a kickstarter backer who paid $1000. He’s a fan’s furry OC. Toby did this as a joke to the Homestuck Kickstarter, where fans paid $10,000 each to have their fantrolls in the game (originally the backer monsters were fantrolls, but where changed to generic monsters later on).

Muffet is the other backer monster, and she is actually part of the story and main-game. She was designed by  Michelle Czajkowski, the creator of Ava’s Demon

————————————

I’ll add more to this list if I find anything else interesting
